thm his5(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba)), wceq(co(c1, csp, co(c0, csm, c2)), co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, co(c1, csp, c2))))
} = {
  3eqtrd(co(c1, csp, co(c0, csm, c2)), co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, co(c1, csp, c2)), cfv(ccj, co(co(c0, csm, c2), csp, c1)), cfv(ccj, co(c0, cmul, co(c2, csp, c1))), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba)))
  3com12(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba), wceq(co(c1, csp, co(c0, csm, c2)), cfv(ccj, co(co(c0, csm, c2), csp, c1))))
  3impb(wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, chba), wceq(co(c1, csp, co(c0, csm, c2)), cfv(ccj, co(co(c0, csm, c2), csp, c1))))
  sylan2(wcel(c1, chba), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, chba)), wceq(co(c1, csp, co(c0, csm, c2)), cfv(ccj, co(co(c0, csm, c2), csp, c1))), wcel(co(c0, csm, c2), chba))
  hvmulcl(c0, c2)
  ax-his1(c1, co(c0, csm, c2))
  fveq2d(ccj, co(co(c0, csm, c2), csp, c1), co(c0, cmul, co(c2, csp, c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba)))
  3com23(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba), wceq(co(co(c0, csm, c2), csp, c1), co(c0, cmul, co(c2, csp, c1))))
  ax-his3(c0, c2, c1)
  eqtr4d(cfv(ccj, co(c0, cmul, co(c2, csp, c1))), co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, co(c1, csp, c2)), co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, cfv(ccj, co(c2, csp, c1))), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba)))
  3com23(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba), wceq(cfv(ccj, co(c0, cmul, co(c2, csp, c1))), co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, cfv(ccj, co(c2, csp, c1)))))
  3impb(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, chba), wcel(c1, chba), wceq(cfv(ccj, co(c0, cmul, co(c2, csp, c1))), co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, cfv(ccj, co(c2, csp, c1)))))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cc), wa(wcel(c2, chba), wcel(c1, chba)), wceq(cfv(ccj, co(c0, cmul, co(c2, csp, c1))), co(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, cfv(ccj, co(c2, csp, c1)))), wcel(co(c2, csp, c1), cc))
  hicl(c2, c1)
  cjmul(c0, co(c2, csp, c1))
  oveq2d(cfv(ccj, c0), cmul, co(c1, csp, c2), cfv(ccj, co(c2, csp, c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba)))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba), wceq(co(c1, csp, c2), cfv(ccj, co(c2, csp, c1))))

thm his35(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, chba), wcel(c3, chba))), wceq(co(co(c0, csm, c2), csp, co(c1, csm, c3)), co(co(c0, cmul, cfv(ccj, c1)), cmul, co(c2, csp, c3))))
} = {
  3eqtr4d(co(co(c0, csm, c2), csp, co(c1, csm, c3)), co(co(c0, cmul, cfv(ccj, c1)), cmul, co(c2, csp, c3)), co(c0, cmul, co(c2, csp, co(c1, csm, c3))), co(c0, cmul, co(cfv(ccj, c1), cmul, co(c2, csp, c3))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, chba), wcel(c3, chba))))
  oveq2d(c0, cmul, co(c2, csp, co(c1, csm, c3)), co(cfv(ccj, c1), cmul, co(c2, csp, c3)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, chba), wcel(c3, chba))))
  adantll(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, chba), wcel(c3, chba)), wceq(co(c2, csp, co(c1, csm, c3)), co(cfv(ccj, c1), cmul, co(c2, csp, c3))))
  3expb(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, chba), wcel(c3, chba), wceq(co(c2, csp, co(c1, csm, c3)), co(cfv(ccj, c1), cmul, co(c2, csp, c3))))
  his5(c1, c2, c3)
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, chba), wcel(c3, chba))), wceq(co(co(c0, csm, c2), csp, co(c1, csm, c3)), co(c0, cmul, co(c2, csp, co(c1, csm, c3)))), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, chba), wcel(co(c1, csm, c3), chba))
  simprl(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wcel(c2, chba), wcel(c3, chba))
  ad2ant2l(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, chba), wcel(c3, chba), wcel(co(c1, csm, c3), chba))
  hvmulcl(c1, c3)
  ax-his3(c0, c2, co(c1, csm, c3))
  mulassd(c0, cfv(ccj, c1), co(c2, csp, c3), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, chba), wcel(c3, chba))))
  simpll(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, chba), wcel(c3, chba)))
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wa(wcel(c2, chba), wcel(c3, chba)), wcel(cfv(ccj, c1), cc))
  cjcl(c1)
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, chba), wcel(c3, chba)), wcel(co(c2, csp, c3), cc))
  hicl(c2, c3)
}

  hicl(c1, c0)

  oveq1d(co(c0, cmv, c1), csp, c2, co(c0, cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba)))
  hvsubval(c0, c1)
  eqtrd(co(co(c0, cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, c1)), csp, c2), co(co(c0, csp, c2), caddc, cneg(co(c1, csp, c2))), co(co(c0, csp, c2), caddc, co(co(cneg(nat1), csm, c1), csp, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba)))
  syl3an2(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba), wceq(co(co(c0, cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, c1)), csp, c2), co(co(c0, csp, c2), caddc, co(co(cneg(nat1), csm, c1), csp, c2))), wcel(co(cneg(nat1), csm, c1), chba))
  mpan(wcel(c1, chba), wcel(co(cneg(nat1), csm, c1), chba), wcel(cneg(nat1), cc))
  hvmulcl(cneg(nat1), c1)
  ax-his2(c0, co(cneg(nat1), csm, c1), c2)
  3adant1(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba), wceq(co(co(c0, csp, c2), caddc, co(co(cneg(nat1), csm, c1), csp, c2)), co(co(c0, csp, c2), caddc, cneg(co(c1, csp, c2)))))
  oveq2d(co(c0, csp, c2), caddc, co(co(cneg(nat1), csm, c1), csp, c2), cneg(co(c1, csp, c2)), wa(wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba)))
  eqtrd(co(co(cneg(nat1), csm, c1), csp, c2), cneg(co(c1, csp, c2)), co(cneg(nat1), cmul, co(c1, csp, c2)), wa(wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba)))
  mp3an1(wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba), wceq(co(co(cneg(nat1), csm, c1), csp, c2), co(cneg(nat1), cmul, co(c1, csp, c2))), wcel(cneg(nat1), cc))
  neg1cn()
  ax-his3(cneg(nat1), c1, c2)
  mulm1d(co(c1, csp, c2), wa(wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba)))
  negsubd(co(c0, csp, c2), co(c1, csp, c2), w3a(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba)))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba), wcel(co(c0, csp, c2), cc))

blocks.name: bcseqi
blocks.content: Equality case of Bunjakovaskij-Cauchy-Schwarz inequality. Specifically, in the equality case the two vectors are collinear. Compare ~ bcsiHIL . (Contributed by NM, 16-Jul-2001.) (New usage is discouraged.)
